title: Pool, Ceiling Fan, Controlled Access/Gated
posting_body: At Granada Villas, we offer many community features such as sparkling pools, relaxing spas, a fitness center, and lush landscaping.
Inside our apartment homes, our amenities are just as luxurious as the outside.

Inside you'll find wall to wall wardrobe closets, patios and balconies with convenient storage, kitchens with new gourmet electric range/oven, dishwasher, microwave, and refrigerator, dining areas with ceiling fans and central heating and a/c in all our apartments.
Visit Granada Villas and discover all that we have to offer.
Enjoy our basketball and game courts plus two glistening pools and spas.
You'll find it all at Granada Villas.
Three or Eleven Month Lease Terms are only available.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
